scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/assignment/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/assignment
  set jcr:title{String} to "Assignment"
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP3
  allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/wknd/us/en/magazine
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/wknd/ca/en/magazine
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us/en/featured
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca/en/featured
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region/apac
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/activity
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities/cycling
   allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine/skitouring
  allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models/article
  allow jcr:read,crx:replicate,rep:write on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models/adventure
  allow jcr:read on /libs
end
